StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMIContractGoalForMCRC]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: (@FiscalYear INT) AS SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY cmp.ORGANIZATION_ID) AS ID, @FiscalYear AS FiscalYear, ro.ORGANIZATION_ID AS OrgID, COALESCE (cmp.MISSION_VALUE, 0) AS MissionValue, ro.SHORT_NAME AS OrgName FROM MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.ORGANIZATION_MAP om ON ro.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'R' AND om.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID = 900 AND -- MCRC Org ID ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT cmp ON ro.ORGANIZATION_ID = cmp.ORGANIZATION_ID AND cmp.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND cmp.CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = 'CMC' AND cmp.MONTH_CODE = 0
